title: Retro 8mm Camera Box Sans
content:
Hi

Before I trace these characters in illustrator, does anybody recognise any of these fonts? I'm assuming they're all from the 60s, possibly 70s.

Any help would be much appreciated.

Thanks

Jono

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [scan-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018120812/http:/typophile.com/files/scan-1_0.jpg) | 45.38 KB |
author: mrjono

comments.content:
No image – need help? [How to post a sample or image](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018120812/http:/typophile.com/node/18067)  
In particular, make sure that:

- the file name does not contain spaces (or any other ø∂∂ ¢håræct€rs)
- you have the right [Flash plugin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018120812/http:/www.adobe.com/products/flashplayer/) installed with your browser

Hi Florian

Sorry about that, I was sure I pressed save but obviously I didn't!

Thanks

I’m not sure whether these are fonts at all. For ‘Automatic’: [Miedinger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018120812/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/miedinger/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D66%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DAUTOMATIC%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D28?refby=mfde) is a wide grotesque with a similar imperfect charm.
Thanks for the suggestion Florian, much obliged
